Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions

How do I list my property on your platform?

Simply create an account, click "List Property" and fill in the required details. Our team will review and approve your listing within 24 hours.

What are your service fees?

We offer various packages starting from AED 299 for basic listings. Premium packages include additional features like highlighted listings and priority support.

How quickly can I expect a response to my inquiry?

Our average response time is 2 hours during business hours. For urgent matters, please call our hotline directly.

Do you provide property valuation services?

Yes, we offer free property valuations for registered users. Contact our agent relations team for more information.
